p: The measured dates of the study section are presented in Table 1. The ages and the records of the environmental proxies indicate there was continuous sedimentation that extended back to ~42.6 cal ka BP based on the Bayesian model of age-depth ( Fig 2). The sedimentation rate in the section is approximately and 0.385 and 0.461 mm/a. The estimated sedimentation rate corresponds with other geochronology in Yunnan Province [ 24, 25]. The characterties of chemical weathering and climate change in the layer (1.75â€“0 m) of XB section were not included in the following analyses because it has the only 14C data around the Holocene.
